author: Flo
content:
This sure looks believable to me! But then I didn't see the original. So how can you ask us whether you made any improvements and made it believable, lol?

Is that a light dusting of snow in the foreground? At first I thought those round bales of hay were sheep, but in the larger image, they are definitely hay bales, probably covered for the winter. I like the division between cool colors on top and warm ones in the bottom half.
